topic.title: Principal Treatment Centre (Children Teenagers and Young Adults)
topic.shortdesc: A Principal Treatment Centre (Children Teenagers and Young Adults)Â (PTC) is a specialist centre where children and young people diagnosed with cancer are treated during a Children Teenagers and Young Adults Cancer Care Spell.
